name: Outlive the Dead
description:
Outlive the Dead is a survival game where the player simply has to outlive the dead (Zombies) & live in style whilst doing so.

EDIT: I can't seem to get the patch notes to work for some reason in the Online/Itch.io version of the game so I have uploaded the patch notes with this post for you to read instead, people who play it on Windows shouldn't run into this issue but just incase you do, the patchnotes file is again available on this post, as well as this please note the current layout of trees and other resources are intentionally placed where they currently are for playtesting purposes only (Apart from the trees they all should respawn after about 15-30 mins), in future updates the resources will actually be scattered around the map!

*THIS IS A VERY EARLY ALPHA RELEASE PLEASE READ THE PATCH NOTES IN THE GAMES MENU SO YOU DON'T GET ANY MISCONCEPTIONS ABOUT THIS GAME*

Please play the game in it's current state and comment any bugs you find in the comments below, including any suggestions you have that would improve the game!
